biography_text: ROSE, Max, a Representative from New York; born in Brooklyn, Kings County, N.Y., November 28, 1986; graduated from Poly Prep Country Day School, Brooklyn, N.Y., 2004; B.A., Wesleyan University, Middletown, Conn., 2008; M.A., London School of Economics, London, England, 2009; attended Oxford University, Oxford, England; United States Army, 2010-2014; New York Army National Guard, 2014-present; staff, Brooklyn, N.Y. district attorney; nonprofit executive; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Sixteenth Congress (January 3, 2019-present).

post_secondary_degrees.institution: London School of Economics, London, England
